Tool Description: A tool for target-based functional analysis of miRNAs.
Explicit Description: Performs enrichment analysis of miRNA targets in biological pathways  to investigate the functional roles of miRNAs in various biological contexts.

Tool Description: A tool for target predictions for miRBase/MirGeneDB miRNAs based on the microT-CDS algorithm.
Explicit Description: Predicts miRNA targets in 3'UTR and CDS regions of protein-coding genes for several species, integrating expression data and experimental support from TarBase 9.

Tool Description: Uncovers microRNAs and transcription factors with crucial roles in NGS expression data.
Explicit Description: Integrates miRNA and mRNA expression data from NGS experiments to identify key regulatory networks involving miRNAs and transcription factors (TFs).

Tool Description: An AGO-CLIP-guided algorithm for the identification of transcriptome-wide miRNA-target interactions.
Explicit Description: Identifies genuine miRNA-target interactions by analyzing Argonaute (AGO) CLIP-Seq data, providing high-confidence, experimentally supported binding sites.

Tool Description: A machine learning-based algorithm for prediction of intergenic miRNA Transcription Start Sites (TSSs).
Explicit Description: Utilizes high-resolution sequencing data and epigenetic marks to accurately predict the starting point of transcription for intergenic miRNAs.

Tool Description: A tool for identifying antimicrobial resistance genes and mutations across species.
Explicit Description: Detects acquired antimicrobial resistance (AMR) genes and resistance-conferring mutations in bacterial genomes, including those in rRNA genes.

Tool Description: An automated miRNA analysis pipeline for Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data.
Explicit Description: A complete, automated workflow that processes raw small RNA-Seq data to perform quantification and differential expression analysis of miRNAs.

Tool Description: A database of miRNA genomic information and regulation.
Explicit Description: Provides comprehensive information on miRNA genes, including their genomic locations and transcriptional regulation.

Tool Description: A database of experimentally supported miRNA targets on protein-coding transcripts.
Explicit Description: A comprehensive, manually curated collection of miRNA-gene interactions validated by low- and high-throughput experiments like HITS-CLIP and PAR-CLIP.

Tool Description: A database of experimentally supported miRNA targets on non-coding transcripts.
Explicit Description: A repository of validated interactions between miRNAs and long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs), derived from manual curation and analysis of high-throughput data.

Tool Description: A database of experimentally supported bacterial sRNA-RNA interactions.
Explicit Description: A curated collection of interactions between bacterial small RNAs (sRNAs) and their RNA targets (mRNAs and ncRNAs) across numerous bacterial species.

Tool Description: A database of experimentally supported microbe-disease associations.
Explicit Description: A manually curated resource linking microorganisms (like bacteria and viruses) to various human diseases, based on published experimental evidence.

Tool Description: A microRNA Tissue Expression Database from high-throughput data.
Explicit Description: Provides miRNA expression profiles across a wide range of human tissues, cell lines, and disease states, based on the analysis of thousands of sRNA-Seq datasets.

Tool Description: A manually curated database of circulating microRNA biomarkers.
Explicit Description: A specialized collection of miRNAs found in biofluids (like blood plasma) that have been identified as potential biomarkers for various diseases.
